attributes.action: Reopen gyms and leisure facilities across the entire UK
attributes.additional_details:
The risk of transmission in these environments is no more, potentially lower, than many of the other attractions and facilities that are now invited to reopen, and have less stringent requirements to meet. 

It is not only the gym owners and PT’s that suffer, the communities they have built suffer too. Training isn’t just about fitness in one dimension, it is good for mental health as well as physical health. 

The industry has created a safe environment for us to recover in. Let them use it.
attributes.background: Today’s reduction of lockdown measures is very welcome. The exclusion of gym and leisure facilities, devastating. These businesses have spent months preparing to operate within all the parameters previously set (2m spacing, reduced numbers inside at one time, additional deep cleaning routines)

rejection.details: Since you started your petition gyms have been allowed to reopen. You can read the Government's announcement about the reopening of gyms here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-announces-gyms-and-pools-to-reopen-safely
